price: Naprotiv! Oni su, uistinu, pravi smutljivci, ali to ne opažaju.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
